You open your pants to see your underwear changing. It turns white, shrinks, and climbs up your legs, forming a modest, white pair of panties. After that, your pants turn the same light purple as your shirt. The two leggings then merge into one, forming a long skirt. A gold and green design rings around the bottom of the skirt. Then, it starts climbing up your legs, ending at about your mid-thigh. It splits at the sides, and the splits go up to your mid-hip. After that, the shirt and skirt merge together, forming a dress of some sort. A pink and purple sash appears around your waist. It forms a bow at your back and goes down to the floor with a gold and green ring at the end.

Then, your footwear starts changing. Your socks disappear and your shoes change material to something like your dress. The shoelaces disappear, exposing the tops of your feet. They turn pink and a dark pink bow appears on the top. Two gold and green rings appear around your ankles. After that, a purple ribbon of some sort appears around your left wrist and hand. A gold ornament with a red jewel appears on the top of your head.

With that, the changes top. You look back at the mirror to see Tiki looking back at you. You are excited that this actually happened and wonder what you should do first.

Then, what happens?
1151311112211.title: clothes change

choices: stay in the house and see what it's like
11513111122111.content:
Before you can celebrate however, there is one last thing left. Suddenly, you fell a lot of discomfort throughout your body. You fall to the floor and try to handle the discomfort. Slowly but surely, the discomfort fades away. However, as it does fade away, you feel strange, as if there was a burning power within you. You realize that you have changed races and become one of the dragon tribe, the manaketes.

With that, you are officially Tiki. You wonder what you should do first.
11513111122111.title: your race changes

115131111221111.content: Do you stay in the real world?
115131111221111.title: stay in the house and see what it's like

1151311112211111.content:
You decide that it will be a better idea to stay in your own world for now. You decide that, since Tiki's body is now your own, you should get to know it better. You strip off Tiki's clothes and look in the mirror. Of course, Tiki has the appearance of a 10 or 11-year old girl, so she's not going to be a knockout. Still, you observe her naked body in the mirror. You guess that the best way to describe her body was "cute". You see her budding breasts and eveything else. You touch some places just to see how they feel. Alien feelings shoot through your body as you do. Eventually, you decide to stop and put your clothes back on. "All right, now what to do next?" You wonder.

What next?
1151311112211111.title: stay in the real world

choices: find a place to use the stone
11513111122111111.content:
Since Tiki is a dragon, maybe you should see what it's like to be a dragon.

"Now where is her stone? Oh, there it is!" You say, still getting used to her higher voice. You see Tiki's dragonstone on the floor. Picking it up, you see that it is a silver color with two rings around it. This is a divine stone, which allows Tiki to become one of 5 species of manaketes, a divine dragon. You know that the others are Fire, Earth, Mage, and Ice. Technically, Tiki can use any stone, but her main one is the divine stone. "Now, I wonder how this works." You say to yourself.

Just then, you get a weird sensation. You get a small batch of memories. You assume that they are Tiki's. You learn how to use the stone. Just as you are about to however, you remember that dragons don't exist in your world and seeing one would be considered very unnatural. You should probably go outside but then someone could see you. What should you do?
11513111122111111.title: play with her dragonstone

115131111221111111.content: "I gotta try this out." You decide as you try to find a place to use the divinestone. You decide to go outside to your backyard. There are alot of trees in your backyard so it might be big enough. You go inside the tree area and find a spot. "All right, now to try this." You say and concentrate on the divinestone. Suddenly, you feel a rush of power through you and you start glowing. It happens so suddenly, and just as suddenly, you stop glowing. You look down to see that it has worked. You have taken on the form of a divine dragon. 'This is cool.' You think and feel a bit of green flame go past your mouth. You probably shouldn't mess around with dragon fire however. With that in mind, you concentrate and transform back. You re-enter your house and decide your next move.
115131111221111111.title: find a place to use the stone

1151311112211111112.content:
Just as you are thinking, you hear someone knock on the door. 'I wonder who that is.' You think and then realize that you had asked one of your friends to come over. You walk over to the door.

Should you open the door as Tiki?
1151311112211111112.title: someone knocks on your door.

11513111122111111121.content:
"Let's surprise' em." You say and walk up to the door. You open it.

Who's at the door?
11513111122111111121.title: yes

115131111221111111211.content:
Emily is at the door. She is your age, younger by about two months. She has a crush on you and you are aware of it, however, you are waiting for the right time to return her feelings (Emily isn't really interested in any one else other than you so you didn't have to worry). Like yourself, Emily is a Fire Emblem fanatic. As you open the door, Emily says, "Hi, Anth-", She starts before realizing that she's looking at nothing.

"Down here." You say. Emily looks down to see Tiki looking right at her.

"W-What the heck?!!" She says.

What does she do?
115131111221111111211.title: Emily

1151311112211111112111.content:
She promptly faints.

"Well, she handled that better than I thought." You say with a smirk. You pick her up, which is quite difficult considering she's bigger than you now, and somehow get her to your room. You lay her on her bed and wait for a few minutes. Eventually, Emily wakes up.

"W-What happened?" She asks.

"You looked at me and fainted." You say.

She looks at you and says, "Are you really Tiki?".
1151311112211111112111.title: she faints

11513111122111111121111.content:
"Actually, it's me Anthony." You tell her. Emily is shocked.

"A-Anthony, really? How?" She asks.

"Calm down, I'll explain." You say as you begin explaining about the watch and it's abilities. Emily calms down and listens.

"Wow, that's one amazing watch." She says and you nod in agreement. "This is so cool!" She says and hugs you tightly.

"Can you please let go off me?" You ask politely, having trouble breathing through Emily's death grip. "You're choking me."

"Sorry. I just can't believe that I am seeing Tiki in real life." She says.

"So, do you want to do something?" You ask.

"Really? You want me to decide?" She asks.

"Sure, I had some fun, now you can decide what to do." You respond.

She smiles and says, "Thank you Anthony. How about...
11513111122111111121111.title: tell her the truth

115131111221111111211111.content:
"Can I become Tiki?" She asks.

"Sure." You respond and start the process on your watch. Suddenly, you are blinded by a flash again. When it fades, you realize that you have changed back to normal.

"I guess only one person can be transformed at anytime." You say and look at Emily. You watch in amazement as she shrinks in size, her body changes, and her clothes change. In seconds, she has turned into Tiki.

"Wow, this is cool." Emily says, noticing her new voice.

"Glad you like it." You respond. What happens next?
115131111221111111211111.title: ...you change me into Tiki

1151311112211111112111111.content:
Before you know it, Emily glomps you.

"W-Woah Emily, take it easy." You say.

"Thank you so much Anthony. How can I ever thank you?" She says.

"How about we go out sometime?" You ask. She looks up surprised, and then smiles.

"I'd like that." She responds.

"All right, how about we go outside?" You suggest and she agrees.
1151311112211111112111111.title: she glomps you

11513111122111111121111111.content:
"First, you need some clothes. You'll be an eyesore in that." You say, pointing to Tiki's clothes that Emily is wearing. She nods in agreement with you.

"Let's get some clothes from my sister's room. Her clothes should fit you." You say and bring Emily to one of your sisters' rooms. Like Tiki appearance, this sister is 10 years old, so her clothes should fit.

"I'll leave you to your business." You say and leave Emily to get dressed. You wait a few minutes and eventually, Emily emerges. She has Tiki's bra and panties on (not that you can tell), a white t-shirt, regular jeans, white running shoes, and a lavender hoodie. She has also taken Tiki's crown off and stuffed her long hair into the hoodie.

"What do you think?" She asks and takes an amusing pose.

"Great." You say with a chuckle. Emily smiles and grabs your hand. You both go outside.
11513111122111111121111111.title: go outside

115131111221111111211111111.content: As you both go to the mall, does anything happen?
115131111221111111211111111.title: go to the mall

1151311112211111112111111112.content:
Suddenly, as you and Emily are going to the mall, the button on the watch that sends the person transformed into the game is press against Emily's arm while you're walking (you had been using the arm with the watch to hold her hand) the watch starts blinking.

"What's going on?" Emily asks.

"I don't know. It hasn't done this before." You respond, neither of you realizing the button had been pressed. Then, the watch lets out a bright flash of light, and it engulfs both of you.

What happened?
1151311112211111112111111112.title: the watch starts blinking

11513111122111111121111111121.content: Both of you or just one of you?
11513111122111111121111111121.title: pulled into the game world

115131111221111111211111111211.content:
"Emily, I think we're getting pulled into the game world!" You yell and Emily agrees as you are sucked into your Nintendo DS back at your house, which had turned on.

Suddenly, you two feel like you are being pulled away from each other.

"Anthony!" Emily shouts.

"Emily!" You respond and try to reach out for her.

Do you grab her?
115131111221111111211111111211.title: both of you

1151311112211111112111111112112.content:
Unfortunately, your reach isn't long enough and Emily disappears in front of you, and you're pushed back, lost in the data, and forced into Marth's body. Then, both of you black out.

Who should we follow until they reunite?
1151311112211111112111111112112.title: not enough

choices: Follow her wishes (this leads to Sentinel's storyline)
Get her to go with you
11513111122111111121111111121121.content:
This storyline will explain what happened to you before meeting up with Emily in the storyline Sentinel started, although the path will branch out to different story events. As this is more real than fictional, weapons won't break like they do in the games, although they can break. The conversations will be very similar to what happens in the game, because you are the only person from the outside world who is in the group at this point, and no real influence has been made by you yet.

You are flying though the game data, screaming when suddenly your body feels weird as you come to a sudden stop and go unconscious. You soon wake up and look around. You notice that you are on a bed inside a room that looks familiar to you, but you can't place it right off hand, you also seem to be a little shorter.

"What happened?" You wonder out loud with a groan, but your eyes go wide when you notice that your voice is different. Suddenly you hear someone outside the room heading towards the room. A soldier wearing completely blue armor comes in.

"Prince Marth, are you awake?" The soldier asks while looking at you as you groggily get up.

'Did he just call me Marth?' You wonder, realizing why the room looks familiar.

"Beggin' your pardon, sire, but the princess has asked to see you." The soldier informs you.

"Is she alright?" You ask, trying to keep mostly the same to the storyline, but not exactly, all the while trying to figure out how you can be Marth 'The watch can't be what caused it since it only turns people into fictional girls, not fictional boys.' You think, but then your eyes go slightly wider. 'If I'm here, then where's Emily? Could she still be Tiki? I'll have to find out when I see her next.' Amazingly, you think of all of this before the soldier speaks again.

"She seemed to be, sire, but her words implied a certain urgency. She bade you dress quickly and wait by the throne." The soldier says.

"What's going on?" You ask.

"It's our forces off in Gra, sire." The soldier replies. "There seems to 'ave been some sort of incident, but... Well, I'm not privy to the specifics."

"I see." You respond. "Thank you, I'll get there as soon as I can." The soldier nods.

"By your leave, sire." He says, to which you nod, and he leaves the room. You get to dressing, feeling odd in these clothes, but you finish dressing anyway and leave the room.

'What's going on?' You wonder again. 'Oh well, I guess I have to play along and go to the throne.' You begin heading to the throne when you hear a voice.

"O'er there, that's him! Prince Marth!" A soldier wearing all red shouts as he goes up to you.

"Who are you? I have somewhere I must go to, and I don't have time to be held up, could you please move?" You ask, making sure not to reveal that you know what's going on, since Marth wouldn't know.

"We're soldiers of Gra, li'l prince, and if you know what's good for you, you'll surrender to us without makin' any trouble." The soldier confronting you replies.

"So, let me get this straight, you expect me to surrender to an allied kingdom in <I>my</I> castle?" You ask. "Why are you after me, anyway?"

The soldier laughs and says "The don't tell you much, do they?" He asks. "No matter, you'll 'ave the full story soon enough, now lay down your sword."

"I guess you didn't get the hint, I'm <I>not</I> going to surrender in my own castle, no matter who I'm facing!" You declare. During this time, you've pulled out your rapier without the soldier noticing.

"You talk big brat." The soldier replies. "Have it your way then, If you won't lay down your sword, then we'll just have to take your life instea-" He begins, but is cut off at the end as you pierce him through the heart. He groans as he falls over and dies. You feel like you'll be sick from taking a life, but you know that you aren't finished yet.

Another soldier who is of the Fighter class comes closer to you. You charge him and stab him, then he swings his ax at you, which you easily dodge, and you retaliate by stabbing him again, causing him to die as well.

"I think I'm going to be sick..." You mutter quietly, before continuing towards the throne, when a soldier who was of the regular soldier class comes up.

"Ha, I've got the weapon triangle advantage." He says.

'Ah crud, he's right.' You think as he stabs you with his lance, although it doesn't hurt much, and you retaliate by stabbing him, followed by slashing him. Amazingly, he is still alive, but not for long as you pull back your arm and thrust your rapier at him, finishing him off.

"Darn, I have to do something." The leader of the small group you have been facing (who, by the way, is of the normal soldier class) mutters, before grinning and getting to the throne, getting bonuses for being on it. You charge forward and stab him, he retaliates by stabbing at you and missing, then you slash him and stab him again, he tries to hit you with his spear and succeeds, but like the soldiers under his command, it doesn't do much to you. You stab him again and end it, then you drag the body away from the throne, and with no more enemies around, you finally puke from the disgust of having to kill. Afterwards you go back to the throne, with princess Elice getting there moments after you get back.

"Marth, are you all right?" Elice asks.

"Yes sister, but what's happening?" You ask.

"Steady yourself, Marth, I have grave news." She replies. "Our father was defeated by the Dolhr-Grust allied forces."

"No..." You say in a sad tone. You knew about this already, but it is still sad to hear, and you also can't risk blowing your cover.

"It was Gra." She states in an equally sorrowful tone. "Out own ally betrayed us and struck Father's army from the rear. I am... I am not sure if he is safe. The scouts who returned gave conflicting reports..." She has tears in her eyes at this point.

"Father..." You say sadly. He may not have been your real father, but in this world he was, making you very sad.

"As we speak, soldiers sent by Gra are trying to take the castle. Mother and I were separated during the escape..." Elice says. "I do not know where she is." You are silent at that, deep in thought. "Marth, I need you to listen to me. You must flee the castle. Go on without me."

"What are you talking about?! I can't do that!" You reply.

"We've not many soldiers left... This is hard to bear, I know, but the castle is lost. We must face that. I will look for Mother and join you as soon as I can. You find Jagen and get away from here, far away. Understand?" She asks.

What will you do now?

Follow her wishes

Learn of your abilities from being in the data, and use them to get her to go with you somehow
11513111122111111121111111121121.title: Prologue

choices: Go to Prologue part 3 (this leads to Sentinel's storyline)
115131111221111111211111111211211.content:
"Ok, but promise me you won't be long." You reply, although you know that she gets captured soon. You run off.

"Goodbye, Marth." Elice says with a sad sigh. "May you live long..."

You run for a while until you are a little bit before the castle gates. Suddenly, two Cavaliers, who you recognize as Frey and Abel, ride up.

"Sire!" Frey exclaims upon seeing you.

"Frey! Abel! You're alive!" You exclaim, trying to keep things similar to how they happened in the game, for now at least.

"Yes, sire." Abel replies. "Princess Elice bade us to protect you. Sir Malledus stayed behind to accompany her."

"Sire, we must be quick." Frey say urgently. "Sir Jagen awaits us at the gates." The three of you begin heading towards the gates, when several Gra soldiers appear.

"Blast! This won't do." Abel says. "How did Gra's soldiers ever make it this far?"

"We need to do something or Jagen and the others will be captured." You say. "We have to secure the area, immediately." Frey and Abel nod in agreement.

"Allow me to go first, sire." Frey says as he rides up to attack regular soldier class soldier with his lance. Frey stabs the soldier, who retaliates with a stab that Frey and his horse dodge. Frey's horse neighs as it gets on its hind legs, before getting back on all fours as Frey stabs down at the soldier, who dies. Abel and you get you swords ready and go near Frey to help him against a fighter class soldier nearby. The enemy leader, who is a regular soldier class soldier, notices you.

"Now who's that who thinks they can sneak up on us?" He wondered out loud before recognizing "you". "Ho ho... What's this? I spy the Altean prince." He chuckles. "Oi, listen up, you lot! Bag the prince! Dead or alive, he'll fetch us as sweet a reward as the mind can conjure!"

"Crud." You say, overhearing the enemy leader. The fighter class soldier runs over and attacks Frey. Frey gets hit with the ax, but he shrugs it off and retaliates by stabbing the soldier. A soldier class soldier comes up closer, and two archer class soldiers arrive. "Guys, they have archers, we have to be careful and make sure they don't take us down from a distance!"

"I agree, sire, let me head out after them." Frey replies. You nod as he heads towards the regular soldier class soldier that isn't the leader and stabs him. The soldier retaliates with a stab that Frey shrugs off, and then Frey goes and stabs the soldier again, killing him.

"Abel, I'll handle this guy, you go after the Archers." You say, referring to the fighter class soldier.

"But sire-" Abel goes to argue, because he is supposed to protect you.

"He's weakened, I can handle him on my own." You cut him off. "You're the only one of us with a ranged weapon." Abel can't argue with that.

"As you wish, sire." Abel says as he charges off and gets his Javelin ready as you head towards the fighter and strike him. He retaliates, but misses. One of the archers goes and shoots an arrow at Abel. It hits, but like Frey has been doing, he shrugs it off and launches his Javelin, which hits the archer and somehow comes back to his hand.

'I'll never understand that.' You think to yourself as the fighter goes to slash you with his ax. You get hit, and while you don't shrug it off like Frey and Abel, it doesn't effect you too much and you retaliate with a stab that kills him. The other archer comes up closer. Frey rides up to that archer and attacks him, while Abel finishes off the other one and you head up towards them. The remaining archer moves away and shoots at Frey, who gets hit, but although the damage is just beginning to show, Frey doesn't let it hinder him and goes up to the archer and kills him.

"Just one left, sire." Abel says. "Allow me to finish this." At your nod of approval, Abel goes up and strikes the enemy leader from a distance with his Javelin, which once again comes back to his hand, allowing him to throw it again and kill the enemy leader. Not much later, A paladin you recognize as Jagen rides up.

"Sire, it gladdens me to see you in one piece. It's not safe for you here; we must be away at once!" He says. You nod, then hear a voice.

"Prince Marth! Where are you? Answer me, sire!" You hear the voice shout. You recognize the line as something that Cain says in the game.

"I'm over here Cain!" You shout. He rides up. "What's going on? You're supposed to be in Gra with my father." You say with a tone of confusion, despite the fact that you know what's going on, then you pretend to just notice the serious wounds that Cain has. "What happened to you?!"

"Sire, it's really you..." Cain says with a sigh of relief. "I feared the worst. That his message... would go undeliv... Agh..." He groans in pain as he tries to finish.

"In that state, I don't know how you could have stayed on your horse, we need to treat those wounds at once!" You reply.

"No, sire. Not until we've escaped." Jagen says. "...Cain, I trust you can put off bleeding to death for just a while longer?"

"Of course, sir... I aim to please..." Cain replies, despite being in obvious pain.

Back in the throne room, Malleus comes up to Elice.

"Princess Elice! The enemy is nearly upon us!" He says frantically. "Gather your things, quickly!"

"No, Malledus. I am staying here." Elice replies.

"S-staying here?! What madness is this?" Malleus asks.

"Too many people have died to keep Altea and its castle safe." She replies. "I cannot abandon what so many lives have bought. With Father and Mother unaccounted for, I am the natural choice to remain with Altea's people, and besides, by staying, I can buy time for the rest of you to escape."

"Nonsense. Just gather your things, and-" He begins.

"Malledus. I am not suggesting, I am commanding." Elice says. "If something befalls Father, Marth will become the last person in the entire world worthy of wielding Falchion. I want you to guide him, Malledus- even when the rest of us no longer can."

"Princess... I will try me best." Malledus replies.

"There's not much time." Elice says. "Go, Malledus. Go!" Malledus leaves, only once looking back.

What happens next?

Go to Prologue part 3 (this leads to Sentinel's storyline)

Night falls before the next part because of your powers activating, and during the night, while the others sleep, you hear a noise. You find Norne being attacked and help her out.
115131111221111111211111111211211.title: Prologue part 2

115131111221111111211111111211212.content:
"No," You say as information of your abilities from being in the data comes to you. "We'll search together, Elice."

Elice's eyes widen, and she blinks. "What?" She asks.

"If you stay here, you run the risk of being captured or killed." You say. "I want to stay with me so that I can defend you. A risk shared is a risk halved."

"Are you sane?" Elice asks you. "You want to search for Mother with me?"

"If you're asking if I'm sane, then try asking yourself." You say. "Don't tell me, mother is dead, and you planned to give yourself up as a decoy?"

Elice bites her lip. "I..." she starts, then shows no sign of continuing.

"Come with me," You say, using your power to bend her will without her realizing it. "Staying here is suicide. Flee with me, sister." You know that she would survive, but you want her to come with you, and so you make it sound more convincing.

Elice sighs. "What to do with you, Marth," She says. "Very well. I'll come."
115131111221111111211111111211212.title: Bringing Elice

11513111122111111121111111121122.content: Unknown to Emily, she is entering Archanea playing the role of Tiki. At what point does Emily start at?
11513111122111111121111111121122.title: Emily (as Tiki)

115131111221111111211111111211222.content: What point during the game?
115131111221111111211111111211222.title: During the game

1151311112211111112111111112112222.content:
Eventually, the light fades and Emily regains her bearings. However, right as she enters, she finds herself not in a good situation. She is in some kind of temple. She suddenly remembers that it looks like the Fane of Raman from Fire Emblem: Shadow Dragon.

'Oh my god! I'm in Archanea!' She screams in her mind. However, she soon realizes that she can't control herself. She looks in front of her to find someone in front of her. He looks very creepy, wears a dark cloak, looks like a zombie, and has dark hair. It doesn't take her long to figure who it is. 'It's Gharnef!' She says in her mind. She also notices that he is using some kind of hypnosis on her. Emily remembers this from the game. 'So that's what's going on.' She realizes. Since she is just in Tiki's body, her mind isn't controlled, but since she's not the one with the watch, she can't resist what's happening.

"Tiki...Tiki... Princess-that-was of the great divine dragons. Can you hear my voice?" He asks.

She can't control herself as words come out of her mouth, "Mm-hmm." She ends up responding.

"Defilers have set foot inside the fane--despoilers! Punish them. Let your fire consume them!" He says next.

'No!' She thinks, but again, she can't control the words out of her mouth, "Defilers...in the fane...Punish them..."

"Remember Tiki. Your divine-dragon kin perished long ago, and Bantu has abandoned you. I alone am protecting you from Medeus. Remember." He finishes.

"You alone...are protecting me...Punish...the defilers" Emily says against her will, but unable to even show any signs of resistance. With that, she sees Gharnef teleport away. 'So, I'm in Chapter 19. This is when Tiki appears and joins Marth.' Emily thinks. She wonders what to do. She doesn't know where Anthony is, and she can't even control her own body. All she can do is wait to be freed from Gharnef's spell.
1151311112211111112111111112112222.title: When Tiki is fought (Chapter 19)

choices: Anthony's (Marth's) army makes it to that spot
11513111122111111121111111121122221.content:
For a little while, Emily (as Tiki) just waits there for Marth's army to arrive. She can't move her body willingly, but she does have her mind.

'I hope Anthony is ok. I wonder what happened to him.' She thinks as continues to wait.

What happens next?
11513111122111111121111111121122221.title: continue

115131111221111111211111111211222211.content:
Eventually, Emily hears the sounds of fighting.

'So, Marth's army is here. I wonder if Anthony has joined them. If he is in this world too, I imagine he would join them.' She thinks. Of course, she still can't control her body.

Time passes, and Emily sees members of the army come closer to where she was. Eventually, someone made it up to her spot.
115131111221111111211111111211222211.title: Anthony's (Marth's) army makes it to her

1151311112211111112111111112112222111.content:
Emily sees you (as Marth) come up to her while the others continue to fight off the enemy soldiers.

'Why is Marth coming up to me? Isn't Bantu the only one who can recruit Tiki?' She wonders. However, Emily doesn't know that Marth is actually you. Since you hadn't been transformed when you were sent in the game, you had been stuck in the game data, and became Marth. You also gained the ability to freely change between Marth and your regular form while in the real world, and since you are in the game data as well, you can change alter some things by altering the data. Right now, you are wondering just who is in front of you.

'Emily was Tiki when we came here. I wonder if she is Tiki now as well.' You think.

You walk up to Emily (Tiki), and she says, "No... don't come any closer..." In a small voice.

'That's right. Gharnef has Tiki under a spell at this point in the game. Well, time to see if she's Emily or not.' You think.

You take a deep breath and say, "Emily, is that you?" The mention of her name sparks something within Emily.

'How does he know my name?' She wonders.

"Emily, it's me Anthony." You say.

What happens?
1151311112211111112111111112112222111.title: Anthony (Marth)

11513111122111111121111111121122221111.content:
Upon hearing that Marth was indeed you, Anthony, something goes crazy inside of Emily.

'It's him! It's him! Thank goodness!' She yells in her mind. Suddenly, she actually starts moving willingly.

From your point of view, you see Emily's eyes clear up. "Good, she's snapped out of it." You say. Just as suddenly, Emily glomps you. "Woah, Emily watch it!" You say.

"Oh, Anthony, thank goodness it's you! I had no idea what had happened to you!" She says.

"Well, it's a long story. I'll tell you later." You respond. After she lets go of you, Bantu walks up to the two of you.

"Oh Tiki, it's good to see you." He says Emily turns to him, remembering how Tiki talks.

"Ban-Ban, it's you!" She exclaims to stay in character.

"Yes, tis I. I'm sorry that I let this happen to you. I won't allow it to happen again." He says. Emily nods as he goes off to fight.

As you two are talking, the remaining enemy soldiers are gone. "Well, that takes care of them." You say. Then Nyna comes up to you, asking if you have the Starsphere and Lightsphere. As it so turns out, you do. You and Nyna go through the same conversation in the game, where you have to take care of Grust before advancing onward. Everyone exited the fane.
11513111122111111121111111121122221111.title: she snaps out of it

115131111221111111211111111211222211111.content:
Later that day, the army is traveling towards Grust. Along the way, you and Emily talk.

"So, how long have you been here?" She asks.

"Well, it looks like we got dropped off at different points in the game. I started at the prologue." You respond. She is surprised.

"Wow, so you've been doing this for a while?" She asks.

"You get used to it eventually. It's not that bad actually, I got these new powers thanks to the watch. The reason why I am Marth is because I went through the game data, and forced into the most important role. As a result, I can alter some things if I want too." You say.

"Really? Cool!" Emily responds.

"Yeah, I picked up the fighting pretty quickly." You say.

A few minutes later, Emily speaks up, "Hey Anthony, I have something to tell you."

"What is it?" You ask.

"I love you. I wanted to tell you that just in case something else happens." She says. Of course, you already knew it.

"Me too Emily." With that, she smiles and hugs you.

"So, what should we do next?" She asks.

"Well, we can stay as long as we like. We can go back to our world anytime. In fact, no matter what time we go back, when we go back, it'll be the exact same time we left." You tell her.

"Well, that's convenient." She responds.

"So, do you want to stay longer?" You ask her.
115131111221111111211111111211222211111.title: later that day

1151311112211111112111111112112222111111.content:
"Yes, let's stay longer. I don't thing anything bad will happen with your powers." Emily says, and then she kisses you on the cheek.

"All right, we'll stay." You say.

What happens next?
1151311112211111112111111112112222111111.title: Stay a little longer

1151311112211111112111111112112222111111.content:
A few days passed as the army headed towards Grust. During that time, you and Emily would just talk and be with each other. Of course, you would also spend some time wth Caeda. Emily knew you would do that though. She knew that you didn't want to mess up the storyline (which the canon storyline was Marth and Caeda marrying). In additon though, spending a few years on Talys did help you feel at ease around Caeda. Emily doesn't mind sharing you however (especially when she knows that you are all hers when you two get back to your own world).

Eventually, you reach the area where you and Emily knew would be the next battlefield. You talk with Nyna regarding Camus the Sable, a man Nyna has fallen in love with. You know that you will have to kill Camus, but both you and Emily know from the 3rd Fire Emblem game that he survives.

"Are you ready Emily?" You ask.

"Yes, as a dragon, how could I not be ready?" She responds.

"By the way, take these." You say as you hand her a firestone and the starsphere. "I assume you know what these do."

"Of course, but why give me the firestone. This is real. My divinestone has no limits now." She responds.

"I know, but maybe the starsphere can give you extra strength. Regarding the firestone, you are the only one who can use multiple stones, so this just gives you variety." You say.

"That makes sense. Oh, since this is real, did you happen to pick up a magestone?" Emily asks.

"Ah, I almost forgot. Yes, I did." You say as you hand her a magestone, a blue stone with a single ring. "I got it from the guy you beat at the Altea Castle. It sucks that this wasn't available in the game."

Both of you hate that. Magedragons are very powerful. They are completely resistant to magic spells on top of their amazing power. However, the magestone is unattainable in the game. Now, however, you can enjoy it as mush as you want.

"All right, with the divine, mage, and firestones, we can't be beaten!" Emily says. You agree.

"All right everyone, CHARGE!" You yell to your army, and you all charge the battlefield.
1151311112211111112111111112112222111111.title: continue the journey

choices: leave it be, stick to the storyline
try to 'convince' (using your powers) Camus to join
1151311112211111112111111112112222111111.content:
You and your army charge the battlefield. Of course, you have been doing this for years, so the enemy soldiers are no match for your forces. Surprisingly, Emily has no problems either. Of course, it's hard to have problems when you have the powers of 3 dragon tribes at your disposal. As a wave of soldiers descends upon Emily, she reacts.

"Let's try this first." She says focusing on the firestone. She glows and transforms into a winged, red fire dragon. "Eat this!" She roars as she ejects a red flame that devours her enemies. "Easy as pie." She says, but not changing back. Seeing another group of soldiers, she says, "All right, time for round 2." and then focuses on the divine stone. She transforms into a winged, silver divine dragon. Her green fire consumes all in her path. A little while later, she spots a group of sages getting ready to blast her. "Uh oh, better get ready." She says. As the sages charge up their magic, Emily now focuses on the magestone. In a flash of light, she turns into a serpentine, black mage dragon. The sages unleash spells of Bolganone, Thoron, and others at her, but they have no effect. On the other hand, her blue flame works just fine on them.

"Well, she's enjoying herself." You say with a chuckle. 'Then again, she's a dragon. How could she not enjoy herself during battle?' You think before getting back to work. Caeda and Minerva take care of any flying units while your paladins: Cain, Abel, and Frey storm the soldiers. Merric and Linde work their magics, Excalibur and Aura, blasting through the enemy knights and generals, with Athena taking care of every enemy that gets in her way.

After a few hours of fighting, you, Emily, and the rest of your fighting force, approach the bridge where the castle is. "Camus! Camus the Sable! Where are you?" You say, trying to stay true to the game. Suddenly, a paladin in black armor holding the stone piercing lance Gradivus, was Camus.

"You are Marth correct? I am Camus." He says. Nyna approaches him and tries to convince him to join your cause.

Of course, you and Emily knew that it will fail. However, Camus is a just man and would be a valuable asset to your cause. What should you do?
1151311112211111112111111112112222111111.title: Chapter 20: Camus the Sable

1151311112211111112111111112112222111111.content:
You decide to leave it be. Camus survives anyway. You'll just have to assure Nyna that he could still be alive.

"The time for talk is over. Draw your weapon, prince of Altea!" Camus says and starts to charge at you. You draw Mercurius (as the rapier might not be strong enough) and prepare for battle. Camus charges at you swinging Gradivus. He lunges at you, and you block it with Mercurius. The force of two regalia sends shock waves around the area. You keep exchanging blows with Camus. Emily holds her breath in anticipation, hoping you won't get carried away. Eventually, you find a brief opening and thrust. "Ugh, w-well d-done, prince of Altea." Camus says as he suffers from the wounds you inflicted and (seemingly) dies. Two cavaliers come, retrieve his body, and ride off.

You look at Nyna and see her despair. She tells you the story of the Fire Emblem and Artemis' Curse. "It seems that now I am cursed." Nyna says sadly.

"Actually, I don't think he's dead." You say.

"What makes you say that?" Nyna asks.

"I just have this feeling that we'll see him again, and I always trust those feelings." You respond.

"I hope you're right." Nyna says. Both you and Emily know now that, with Grust down, it's time to head to Macedon.
1151311112211111112111111112112222111111.title: leave it be, stick to the storyline

1151311112211111112111111112112222111111.content:
After routing the remaining Grust soldiers and recruiting Ymir, you, Emily, and the army head towards Macedon. Along the way, you decide to stop and set up camp. Caeda comes into your tent later.

"Marth, may I talk to you?" She asks

"Sure." You respond and you go to where she is. "What do you want?" You ask.

"I'm curious. Do you have some sort of relationship with Tiki?" Caeda asks.

"U-Um." You don't know how to answer that, but luckily, she doesn't notice, because she continues.

"Since we met her, you two have been talking as if you were old friends." She continues.

"Not really, it's just that she was alone for so long and I'm trying to help her." You say. Caeda looks at you for a second.

"All right, that makes sense." She says and walks off.

"Phew." You sigh in relief. Emily comes into the tent, as she had been nearby and heard the whole conversation.

"You handled that well." She tells you. Then, she continues. "Hey Anthony, I've been wondering. Can I take over two bodies at once?"

"Why?" You ask.

"It's just that, you know that Tiki gets put to sleep again after this journey, but I don't want to leave her, but I also want to stay with you."

"Well, yes, I can do that because of the abilities I gained from being in the game data, but who is the other?" You ask.

"Who else, Caeda." She responds. "That way, I can still have a relationship with you, even when Tiki goes to sleep again."

"I guess that would work." You respond.
1151311112211111112111111112112222111111.title: fast forward over Chapter 20x

1151311112211111112111111112112222111111.content:
"All right, I'll try it now." You decide as you activate your control of the game data and focus it in the watch. You copy Emily's data (since you two are in the game world, you're data), then copy it to Caeda's data and press a button on the watch. You do have some concerns about Emily being in two bodies, however. You just hope that your fears are groundless. A flash of light occurs and then disappears. You look at Tiki's body.

"Emily, are you still there?" You ask.

"Yes, I'm still here." She responds. Almost immediately, Caeda comes up and hugs you from behind.

"Surprise." Caeda's body says.

"I take it that it worked? You're Emily as well?" You ask.

"Yep, it's me." Emily says in Caeda's voice.

"So, how does it feel being in two bodies?' You ask.

"Kind of strange, but cool as well." "Caeda" responds. You know how weird it's going to be with two Emily's.

"All right then, let's get going." You say. Immediately, both "Tiki" and "Caeda" grab your left and right arms.

"Sit with me Anthony!" "Tiki" says.

"No, me!" "Caeda" argues.

Yeah, this is what you were afraid of.
1151311112211111112111111112112222111111.title: do that now

1151311112211111112111111112112222111111.content:
The days pass by, and the army travels into Macedon. Along the way, with your girlfriend in two bodies, things get complicated to say the least for you. They never fight or anything, but they take every oppertunity to get your attention. You just have to grin and bear it for now.

Eventually, you all reach the sight of the next battlefield. You are in Macedon, the land of dracoknights. Fittingly, there are tons of dracoknights waiting for you. You see Minerva, the Macedonian princess, looking off at them. "Are you all right Minerva?" You ask, knwoing what happens in the game.

"I'm fine." She reponds.

"Are you sure?" You ask "This is your homeland."

"You think that that I want to save my former vessels and citizens. Spare them for thinking differently?" She asks.

"Don't you?" You ask.

"I'd be lying if I said it was easy. However, when Macedon went down, history needs to know that it was a Macedonian who set things right." She replied.

"All right, don't push yourself." You say.

"Thank you." She says before getting into battle position.

You glance at your army, knowing that you have to keep track of both "Caeda" and "Tiki" now.

"Well, there's not point in worrying about it now. All right, CHARGE!" You shout, and the battle is on.
1151311112211111112111111112112222111111.title: Chapter 21: Clash in Macedon

1151311112211111112111111112112222111111.content:
You lead your warriors into battle. It is an uphill battle, all you have to do was go straight through the battlefield. You, with your rapier, then start attacking their cavalry. Navarre and Athena cut down all in their way while Gordin and Norne start bringing down the Pegasus Knights. You know that you have to keep an eye on both "Caeda" and "Tiki" now so you start looking for them. It doesn't take long to locate them. "Tiki" was handling the Manaketes with no problem, thanks to her three Dragonstones. Meanwhile, "Caeda", the who is still a Pegasus Knight, is also having almost no problems. With an equipped dragonpike, she's tearing down the opposing Dracoknights.

Meanwhile, you start thinking. "Caeda" is still a Pegasus Knight, unpromoted. You have promoted your units throughout the game, like Ogma to Hero, Navarre to Swordmaster, Merric to Sage, and so on. You remember that Pegasus Knights can use either a Master Seal (Dracoknight) or Elysian Whip (Falcoknight).

'I should probably promote Emily, she could use the extra power.' You think.

Which one will you use? Master Seal to Dracoknight, or Elysian Whip to Falcoknight?
1151311112211111112111111112112222111111.title: the battle rages on

1151311112211111112111111112112222111111.content:
You decide to go with the Master Seal.

"Hey Caeda!" You yell out. She hears you and comes to you after dispatching her last enemy.

"What is it?" "Caeda" asks.

"I realized that you haven't promoted classes yet." You reply.

"Yeah, I guess I haven't." She replies, looking down at her pegasus.

"Let's take care of that now." You say, causing her to she nod. You take out a Master Seal and give it to her. She takes it and starts concentrating. Suddenly, there is a white flash of light. As it fades away, you see...
1151311112211111112111111112112222111111.title: Master Seal (Dracoknight)

1151311112211111112111111112112222111111.content:
..that the seal worked perfectly. Standing in front of you, you see "Caeda" in new armor, riding a green wyvern.

"All right, it worked!" You say. "Caeda" looks at you.

"Feels so much different than being a Pegasus Knight. I gotta wonder though, who came up with the idea to make Pegasus Knights to Dracoknights in the first place? It doesn't make sense" She responds.

"Who knows. Anyway, let's continue the battle." You say, to which "Caeda" nods.

The battle continues on. With her new strength, "Caeda" starts ripping through the enemy units in her way. Eventually, you yourself slay the enemy boss and the army takes a rest inside the seized fort.

Inside the fort, you enjoy a pleasant conversation with Emily in both Tiki and Caeda's bodies.

However, as you two (or three) chat, someone is watching you, confused at what is going on.

Who is it?
1151311112211111112111111112112222111111.title: It worked

choices: Copy Emily's data to Maria as well.
1151311112211111112111111112112222111111.content:
Frankly, "Caeda's" and "Tiki's" antics have you on edge. You have to put up with both of them, because both of them are your girlfriend in disguise, but that doesn't mean it's easy to do so. You just have to hope that it doesn't carry over to the real world.

In any case, to cut down on gossip, you, "Caeda", and "Tiki" have a private set of rooms. You are well aware that a man and two women all alone in the same set of rooms is enough cause for gossip, but the alternative is for your men to see "Caeda" and "Tiki" fighting over you. Better to remain silent and be thought a fool, than to speak and remove all doubt.

Unfortunately, someone still makes the effort to spy on you.

Maria. The younger princess of Macedon. She's a very outgoing person, with romantic fantasies (about Marth) and a wagging tongue. She tells her older sister Minerva everything, and while Minerva isn't a gossip, she's also not a subtle person and might tell everyone.

So when you see a familiar red head of bob-cut hair around an ajar doorway, seeing Emily and you having time together, you can't help but wonder what to do.
1151311112211111112111111112112222111111.title: Maria's Eye Spy

1151311112211111112111111112112222111111.content: How about copying your data to Maria?
1151311112211111112111111112112222111111.title: You in Maria?

1151311112211111112111111112112222111111.content:
You sigh. “Maria, come in.” You say to her.

The head disappears behind the door. Then the door opens fully and Maria steps inside. She’s looking downward shamefully.

“Were you spying on us?” “Caeda” asks.

Maria bites her lip. “Yes, I was.” She says defiantly. “You three get private rooms. I want to know what’s going on behind the scenes. You’ve been sleeping with these two, haven’t you, Marth!?” She finishes.

This is not true, of course. But you can see how she might think that.

“Hey, hey, why not copy my data over hers?” “Tiki” whispers in your ear.

“No.” You say adamantly. The last thing you wanted was a third party in Emily’s war with herself. It was bad enough having to put up with just Caeda and Tiki. “Wait a second.” You add. “I have an idea.” You fiddle around with the watch for a second, then press the “apply” button and… your data is copied onto Maria’s. It’s a strange feeling, being in two bodies at once, neither being the same gender. You can feel both bodies move at your will and see out of both of their eyes. Somehow, the sheer information overload doesn’t affect you.

“Interesting.” You say as Maria, who at this point is a Bishop and can use offensive magic.

“You… did you…” Both "Tiki" and "Caeda" look between you and “Maria.”

“Yep.” You say, smiling, as Marth. “I copied my data over to her.” As “Maria”, you walk out the door, closing it behind you. You then say, “So, tomorrow is the big battle for Macedon. Let’s get some sleep before the big day.” Both of the girls agree.

-The next day-

You arrive at Macedon Aerie. It’s a twenty-story tower where Macedon’s famous winged mounts are stabled and trained, and also where their riders are trained to handle them.

“You all right, Anthony?” “Tiki” asks “Maria.”

“It’s really disorienting.” You say as Maria. “Suddenly, I have to keep track of two bodies. I don’t know how you manage.”

"You'll get used to it." She replies.

Your army swarms around the base of the aerie, toward the entrance on the opposite side. Pegasus Knights and Dracoknights swarm out of the aerie, attacking back, along with Horsemen and Cavaliers, as well as the occasional Paladin. An epic battle ensues.

Ymir proves to be a good pick for this battle. His ability to use both bows and axes makes him a deadly force against the Lance-wielding (and therefore Axe-vulnerable) flying units. Ogma’s troupe of mercenaries also plays a role, with Bord, Cord, and Barst felling their own share of Lance-wielding foes. Ogma himself is also playing a starring role – by this point, he’s become a Hero, able to use axes as well as swords. You (as Maria) is healing just behind the front lines, and Emily is kicking butt as both Caeda and Tiki. Horace’s high Defense is serving him well, as his ability to use bows and lances. Wolf and Sedgar, and in fact Hardin the Coyote’s entire division of Cavaliers and Horsemen, are doing just as well. Along the way, you have "Maria" use warp on you to the village where Gotoh is and have him create Starlight

Finally, you fight your way to the top of the aerie, where you know Michalis, the current king of Macedon and Maria’s and Minerva’s older brother, waits for you and your army. But what to do about him? Fight him, or recruit him?
1151311112211111112111111112112222111111.title: Becoming Maria

1151311112211111112111111112112222111111.content:
You listen as Nyna tries to turn Camus over to your side, but you know it is no use.

Finally, as Camus refuses her, you lose yourself and yell, "Your country is falling, Camus! Join us and you will survive for a greater cause!"

"If my country is falling, I will fall with it, as is a knight's duty," Camus says. "I cannot betray my country. Please understand, Prince Marth, Princess Nyna." He draws Gradivus and attacks you.

You are forced to parry with Mercurius. "Camus..." you whisper.

Again and again Gradivus is thrust toward you, and every time you manage to block its thrusts. Then Camus retreats to a safe distance and throws Gradivus at you. The point grazes you, and then it returns to Camus. You are forced to move in close to attack.

"Camus!" you yell as you do so. "What is it that makes a country?"

"What nonsense is this?" Camus yells back, blocking your attack with his shield.

"Caeda told me once," you yell as you narrowly dodge a return thrust from Gradivus. “’A country without king is a country still, but a king without subjects rules naught but hills.’ If you give your life defending your country from those that would save it from its king, it is the same as abandoning your country!” Obviously, Caeda never told you that. However, you remember from playing Fire Emblem Shadow Dragon that it was one of her father’s favorite sayings, and she uses it to recruit the substandard prepromote unit Lorenz – on the very map that you are fighting on now.

Suddenly, Camus’s attacks stop. You look at him, and he looks like he is deep in thought. “Do you think that your mad logic will turn my loyalty?” he asks finally.

“Well, won’t it?” you have to ask.

Camus smiles. “Fear not, Altean prince. From this moment, I side with my country before my king. And yes, that means that I side with you – and with you, Princess,” he adds to Nyna.

Nyna’s expression becomes a relieved one. “Camus…” she says, running to him. “Camus!!”

“Hate to disrupt such a touching moment,” you say, “but this is still a battlefield. You two had better save it for later.”

They both seem to snap out of it. “Ah… yes, right,” Camus says. Nyna slows down and retreats to a safe distance.


In summary, you recruited General Camus, the battle was won easily, and you had hardly a casualty.
1151311112211111112111111112112222111111.title: try to 'convince' (using your powers) C...

1151312.content:
You wait for a few minutes. "Nothing's happening" Is someone pranking me or something?" you think. You are completely unaware that the changes will become slowly.

You wonder what you should do now.
1151312.title: slowly

11513121.content:
"Well, I might as well watch some TV." You say as you go downstairs, unaware of the events to come.

You go to the family room and sit down on the couch. As you sit down, you subconsciously cross your right leg atop your left. You wonder why you would do that, but shrug it off as nothing important as you uncross it. As you turn the TV on, your chest starts feeling itchy. You scratch at them a little and continue on. However, as you are flicking through the channels, you notice that the remote has gotten bigger. No, it's not that. Your hand is much smaller and more petite then before. It's the same with your other hand. You wonder what is going on, practically forgetting your earlier wish.

What do you do next?
11513121.title: go watch TV

115131211.content: You just shrug it off, thinking that you are imagining things, and continue looking for something to watch on TV you then stop on a channel with a fashion show going on, and all of the sudden you feel some hair in your face. You brush it out of the way as you continue looking through channels for something you would like to watch, only for the hair to just come back into your face. You are so into finding something to watch that you don't realize that your hair is longer and is turning green.
115131211.title: Continue watching TV

115132222.content: How about Nagi, who, according to the game data and several things in the game itself, is Tiki's father, Naga, reborn as a female (anyone else creeped out about this)?
115132222.title: Nagi?

1153.content:
Fire Emblem 6, later subtitled in English as Fire Emblem: The Binding Blade is the first Fire Emblem game on the Game Boy Advance and on a handheld. It features Roy, who is well-known for his playable appearance in Super Smash Bros. Melee. Unfortunately, the game has yet to see an overseas release outside of its native Japan.

Still, that didn't stop many FE fans, yourself included, for finding an alternative like fan translated versions on the Internet. Finding the game highly entertaining, you were excited to transform into one of the game's many female characters.

So what girl do you wish to transform into?
1153.title: Fire Emblem 6 (The Binding Blade)

11531.content: Do you wish to be Lilina?
11531.title: Lilina

115312.content: Do you wish to be Fir?
115312.title: Fir?

1153121.content:
Fir is a teenage girl and a myrmidon from Fire Emblem: The Binding Blade. She is the daughter of the warrior Bartre and the Sacean swordsman Karla from the game's prequel, Blazing Blade. This also makes her the niece of the Sword Demon, Karel. Anyway, she was born on the Western Isles prior to the start of the game.

She is a a cool and detached character who lives by the sword. She strives to surpass her mother and uncle in the sword arts. Thus, she is dedicated to it and not much else. However, her strong obsession with the sword makes her quite clumsy with things outside of fighting. She is recruited on the Western Isles by her part-time teacher Noah. Like other non-lords in the game, she had no support endings and thus much of her fate in unknown. Anyway, in the game, she also carries a sword of great worth that is seeked out by bandits: the Wo Dao, an upgrade over the Killing Edge with a far superior critical hit rate.

Here she is:

http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20...

"Hmm, well she would be interesting. I might as well humor this thing" you said with a chuckle, not fully believing that this tiny device was capable of such magic. Anyway, you liked the design of the myrmidon and thought she was pretty hot. So, going to the Fire Emblem Wiki and looking at the above image. you printed out the picture and scanned it with the watch.

However, after a few minutes, nothing happened.

"Figures" you said, as if you knew it wouldn't work. You shouldn't have been so quick to judge.
1153121.title: Yes!

1153122.content: Do you wish to be Ellen?
1153122.title: Ellen?

11531222.content: Do you wish to be Cath?
11531222.title: Cath?

choices: Use a friend to test it
115312221.content:
Cath is a thief from Fire Emblem: The Binding Blade. She is a young girl whose village was burned by her own father under orders from a noble. As such, she has a hatred for nobles and steals from them and gives it to the poor. She eventually trusts the words of Roy enough to join his army under the promise that he helps stir the nobility in the right direction. Oddly though, she does not support with Roy. She's a good unit despite the lack of an Assassin class in the game.

http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20...

Liking the character a lot, you decided to download the data into the watch. You found the link above and downloaded it to the watch.

"Suppose I should see if this thing is ligit" you said to yourself.

However, do you use it on yourself or come up with another idea?
115312221.title: Yes!

1153122212.content:
"Maybe I could test this on someone else" you said to yourself. However, doing it that way risked you looking like a fool if nothing happened. Well, nothing ventured nothing gained as they say. The only question was who to call.

Then, you came up with your answer: Emily. You and her were very good friends and she had a crush on you. What she didn't know was that you knew about it. You smiled as you thought about her. She had no idea you shared her feelings. Well, this would be an interesting oppertunity for the both of you.

You also knew that she shared a similar liking to games as you did, epecially the Fire Emblem games. Just a while ago, you helped her get a fan-translated Fire Emblem: Sword of Seals/The Binding Blade for her computer. She was very grateful and hoped to repay the favor sometime. Well, now would be as good a time as any.

With delay, you went and called her number. "Hello Emily?" you asked into the phone. "Hi Anthony!" said Emily on the other side. "Hello, would you like to come over here? There's something I want to show you" you told her.

154321.content:
It was pretty surprising to see such a random thing fall out of the TV like that. Needless to say, you were a little skeptical about the idea, even with the little watch-like device apparently stating as much. Almost sounded kind of wish-fulfillment in a way. Still, only one way to find out if it was for real

"Guess I can spare a little time to give it a try," you shrugged a little, looking over the watch-like device.

It looked like a pretty sophisticated device, but you tried your best anyway to navigate it. Pushing a button on it, it began bringing up an entire list of various media. Quite an expansive list I tell you. Nodding a little at that, you began to navigate through them, seeing so many of your favorites listed.

"Well....guess I gotta decide on something to try this out with...." you mumbled, happening to look at something you had been playing recently. "Yeah....let's look there."

Kingdom Hearts had been something you had liked for a long time, with the recent release of Kingdom Hearts 3 helping revitalize your interest after some time. You of course had pretty much played every game, enjoying most if not all of them. What better way to trial run this thing than with such a fine series.

"Let's see....Kingdom Hearts......ah there it is!"

Indeed there it was, and it immediately brought up a list of characters. Given that the device only mentioned females when you first got it, Kairi was at the top of the list (shocker) while the remaining significant females followed afterwards followed by the lesser characters. You know, for the sake of fun, why not go with Kairi. She was a character you liked after all. Heck, you were pretty glad at how her relationship with Sora actually bore some fruit (figuratively and literally) in the last game.

"Okay, let's go there," you nodded, pressing on Kairi's game.

Next it went to a list of games, showing off appearances from everything she was in. It was surprisingly thorough, going all the way back to her child days in Birth by Sleep, first debut in the first Kingdom Hearts, and going all the way to the recent Kingdom Hearts 3. Given your recent experience there, you figured that it was as good as any, being the newest release.

"Okay, Kingdom Hearts 3 it is," you said, hitting it.

A "Choice Confirmed" sentence displayed itself on the watch, and then came the sound of the device's inner workings coming to life. It got a little bit loud too, making you hope no one could hear it.

"What is...."

And then just like that, the sound reached a peak and a bright light blinded you for a second, leaving just as quickly as it came but leaving you stunned all the same. You shook your head, trying to get your head on straight and getting the blurriness out of your eyes. Okay, that was pretty annoying not going to lie. Nothing seemed to be different though. Your room was still the same, and so were you.

"So...it just makes a bright light? Kind of a dud if you ask me," you shook your head. "Well....it was a funny idea anyway."
154321.title: Kairi

1543211.content:
Well, the watch was pretty fancy at any rate. You could at least get something out of that. Your old watch was kind of cruddy anyway. So, with that being said, perhaps it was time to get back to whatever you were doing.....

"Ugh!"

You grunted a little, feeling like something just shot through you like electricity. It didn't hurt really but it was strange all the same, making you freeze in place for a few seconds before your body began to move once again.

"What was that?" You wondered out loud as you stood in place looking yourself over.

There was a tingly feeling as you looked over yourself. It didn't seem to be going away either. In fact....it seemed to be growing....

"Wah!" You cried out.

Suddenly, you felt like you were shrinking slightly, visible from the sense that your bedroom was looking a little bigger that usual. Your whole body was feeling smoother, with your arms and legs especially feeling like they were getting smaller and leaner. Bringing your arms in front of you, you could even see your hands getting smoother and smaller, with your nails even looking better kept.

The sensations continued before you could process them any further. Along with your feet following your hands example, your legs were looking leaner before your hips began to gently push out, a lot less discomforting than it would be other wise. Moving further up, you felt a small kick in the groin, moving one little hand there to feel nothing but flatness.

"Oh....my God.....I have to be dreaming..." You said in disbelief.

Moving up, your waist gracefully caved in, giving gentle curves to your body before going further up. A slight pressure rose as decently sized breasts formed, pushing against your now oversized shirt. Your shoulders even moved inwards, making your shirt fall off one of them awkwardly. Speaking of which, your clothes were just barely holding on now.

The sensation moved up your face then, making you cringe a little as stuff began to change. Your overall head shape rounded, with the jawline became smoother. Your lips puffed out slightly, with the cheekbones rising a little. Your nose and ears smoothed as well. Your eyes even became softer while becoming a bright blue. As if finishing it off, your hair grew out rapidly, going down to above the shoulders while turning a deep red.

"Is this..... Kairi's.....?" You croaked out, your voice surprising you with how it sounded exactly like hers.

What happened next could only be described as magical. Basic clothes formed out of your old ones, including a white shirt and undergarments. Right over it, a pink and black dress formed over you. It featured a hood in the back, and also was held together with a belt around the waist. It held an assortment of designs over both the top and the skirt, the latter being divided between two different designs on both sides.

And to finish the look, a pair of black belted boots formed on your feet, bringing the sensations to a quick close.

To say you were stunned would be an understatement. Did you really just transform? A quick pinch confirmed just that, as cliche as it was. You kept looking back and forth between your hands and the rest of you, making small noises with your voice just to get a feel for it.

"Oh my god......I'm Kairi..."

Wow...what a feeling it was! Weird as heck, but amazing all the same! It all felt so real. Ducking in to your connected bathroom briefly, you really looked like a version of her in real life, albeit with still a little cartoon influence if you could call it that. You went back to your room soon after.
1543211.title: Transformation

15432111.content:
Okay, this was so crazy. You really had just become a girl, and a fictional one at that! It was like...the ultimate cosplay or something like that. You weren't sure how exactly to describe it, but you couldn't deny that it was awesome now that you knew the watch wasn't fooling you.

"I could get used to this," you said with a wide smile, flexing your hands a little as if still in disbelief.

And then....right at that moment...

"Hello?" asked a tiny voice, creaking open the door.

You immediately recognized it. It was Zoey, a little girl from a family of sisters your family knew pretty well. Some of them would come over on occasion, except for Sarah since she was always "busy" so to speak. Zoey was a true delight though, being a real sweetheart through and through. You got along with her well, and she'd even watch you play. Well, the ones that were age-appropriate anyway. Kingdom Hearts happened to be a series you both enjoyed, her especially since she liked almost everything Disney to begin with.

On the other hand though, you felt like slapping your face at the fact that you left your door ajar. Great job Anthony....and it was too late to try to tell Zoey to stop since she already opened the door wide.

"Oh no...." you groaned.

Suffice to say, Zoey's face went from her usual excitement to stunned silence. She stood there, taking in what seemed to be a real-life version of a character she really liked. Though, she didn't think too deeply on it and smiled again.

"Oh hi, are you one of Anthony's cosplay friends?" she smiled.

Okay, first of all, who taught her that word? Secondly, when did you ever have cosplay friends? You were kind of a lone wolf for a reason you know. Ugh, Zoey was too sweet for her own good sometimes. Well, as easy as it could be to convince her that you were just a friend of "Anthony", Zoey would likely run off and tell everyone which you couldn't have happen.

"Okay, first of all, let's close the door," you said quickly, walking right over to close the door and lock it behind Zoey, breathing a sigh of relief that no one else seemed to hear.

"Huh? What's wrong?" Zoey asked.

Well...you couldn't really lie to her....gues you had to bite the bullet here.

"Zoey...it's me Anthony," you said simply after a little pause.

"Huh?" Zoey tilted her head in surprise. "Are you okay?"

Yeah, that was a little too bizarre to believe wasn't it? Zoey wasn't stupid enough to believe just anything, despite her childhood innocence. You wondered what you could do to convince her. Tell her something only the two of you would know? Eh, that'd be hard to be honest.

"Well...." you mumbled, looking over the watch.

Curious to see if there was anything else you could do, you looked at the watch, much to Zoey's confusion. Actually, when you looked at it, some new options had come up, seemingly related to your current transformation. There was a dispel option to go back to normal presumably, a few other notable options, and some other stuff. However, as you were going to dispel the change, you saw another option. It said "Transfer current transformation" and even gave a little arrow pointing towards the nearest person, Zoey obviously.

That gave you a better idea, and your subsequent smile matched Kairi's own.

"You know what? I got a better way to show you," you said.
15432111.title: Someone enters your room

154321111.content:
"Huh?" Zoey said again. "Are you okay?"

"Just hold on," you said, a little impatiently.

You hit the button the option you just looked at, looking at the watch whirling again just like it did before, bringing forth another light just like then. Zoey cried out a little at the sudden flash, leaving her blinded by the time it began to subside. Having already experienced it, you were more than prepared.

"What was that?!" Zoey cried out as her eyesight began to come out.

"You'll see," you smiled, more out of hope than anything else.

Suddenly, you began to feel a sensation flow throughout you, although it felt more familiar this time. Familiar mostly because you began to see some of your old features returning, giving you an impression that the order was being taken literally. Heck, you could already feel your face beginning to turn back to normal. Something Zoey noticed and gasped at.

"A-Anthony?!" she cried out. "W-What is-AHH!"

As your features began to regain their former look, Zoey was changing just as fast, and more dramatically to that point. Being a little 10-year old, she was growing up fast, up to the height you were just at, giving you an idea that it was working exactly as you thought it would happen. It was quite the sight seeing her stunned reaction, gasping at her growing form. And of course, it wasn't just in height. Everything that came with female puberty came too; curves, breasts, and everything in between. Her pig-tailed hair came undone, turning a dark red into Kairi's own look.

As her own dress flowed into Kairi's own appearance, Zoey was left dumbfounded at what just happened. You were clearly Anthony, she could tell that much. But this....

"What just happened?!" she cried out, her eyes widening as her hands went over her mouth. "I....I sound just like Kairi!"

"That's because you are her now," you smirked a little, flashing the watch. "Long story short, this little thing can cause transformations like that. I just used it, and basically gave it to you. What do you think?"

Zoey didn't answer for a while, her hands going everywhere on her body. The dips and curves of a teenage girl's body was something she had yet to experience, and feeling it all given to her at once was astonishing. Not to mention, all of this on top of looking like one of her favorite characters.

Funny enough, she pinched herself exactly like you did. Once she did, her shock gave way to a wide smile.

"AHHHHHH!" she squealed out, coming right over and hugging you. "Anthony this is so cool! You're awesome!"

"Okay okay, you're very welcome," you chuckled, getting the newly-teenaged girl off of you.

"I can't believe I'm really Kairi! It's like a dream!" she giggled, now clearly enjoying this new voice of hers. "I wonder if I can do anything she can. Oh, and I can actually do teenaged things too!"

"Okay calm down tiger," you grinned. "Let's not get too carried away."

"But it's fun," Zoey smiled, a little calmed down though, giving off a more Kairi-like smile. "Hey, can you become Sora?"

"Uh...don't know," you said, not entirely sure. "Let me see."

You gave it a quick look, but it became easily apparent after a while. There weren't any males with the options you used.

"Nope. Apparently not. There are no guys in here," you said.

"Phooey," she pouted a little. "I would have liked that....."

You figured she was just liking the idea of the roleplay, not knowing Zoey's inner mental thoughts. Still though, she brightened up again.

"Okay, then in that case, you should be Xion or Namine!" she said, back to her usual self. "Then we'd be like sisters at least!"

Well, it was an interesting proposition, and you were just Kairi yourself so you had a taste for it.
154321111.title: You give Zoey your transformation

1543211111.content:
"Well...it's an interesting idea," you murmured to yourself.

Naturally, Zoey got all the more excited at the idea.

"Come on! Do it!" she squealed. The idea of a boy turning into a girl didn't seem to faze her in the slightest. If anything, it only seemed to encourage her. Plus, she was quite curious to see it in action given you had already become Kairi when she came into the room.
