1551121.title: Yes

15511211.content:
"Hmm, Yuna" you think out loud.

In Final Fantasy X-2, she is the main protagonist. You thought that she was beautiful in the first game and the second game made you think no different. Looking on the internet, you found a picture of Yuna's artwork from X-2 and scan it with the watch.

Does something happen?
15511211.title: gradual

155112111.content:
"Guess it was a rip off" you say, noticing that nothing changed.

Anyway, you had to get ready for...
155112111.title: nothing

1551121111.content:
"Anyway, I got to get ready for school" you say as you grab some clean clothes and exit your room.

Eventually, you reach the bathroom and close the door behind you. You take off your dirty clothes and turn on the warm water. When it's warm enough, you step in.

What starts to change?
1551121111.title: school

15511211111.content:
Inside the shower, you start to do your usual routine. You start by taking the bar soap and washing your body with it. However, as you rub it against you, your skin starts to become smoother. It becomes lighter and softer like silk. After you wash your self, you seem to realize that you do feel softer. However, you brush it as nothing.

Next, you take your hair shampoo and begin to wash your hair. As you do, your hair starts to change as well. As you washed your hair, it started to lengthen. It grew down almost to your shoulders. Also, as you wahed, it started to change colors, from a dark drown to a slightly reddish brown. It also slightly changed to a certain hairstyle.

After that, you finished up. You turned of the water and grabbed a towel. Wrapping it around yourself, you head towards the mirror. You see that your hair looks longer. However, you think that you just need to get a haircut soon.

You didn't notice but also....
15511211111.title: skin and hair

155112111111.content:
You failed to notice but your eyes were different. In fact, they were different in each eye. Normally, your eyes were dark brown. Now, your left eye was a bright blue. Your right eye was now a green color. You put on a white undershirt, blue t-shirt, and shorts and leave the bathroom.

To where now?
155112111111.title: your eyes were different

1551121111112.content:
"I guess I'll head downstairs" you decide as you walk there. Once you get downstairs, you decide to drain some time with a little TV. Heading to the family room, you sit down on the couch and turn on the TV.

As you watch whatever, something happens. you start to slowly decrease in build. Your hard-trained muscles start to shrink but not by a lot. You still retain some muscle. However, you shrink down a few inches and you are a bit thinner. Also, all the body hair on you dissappeared, leaving just the hair on your head. However, you didn't notice as your clothes refit your new size.

What's next?
1551121111112.title: downstairs

15511211111121.content:
"I think I'll head to the park" You say as you make a lunch for yourself for later, and put it in a lunchbox. You pick up the lunchbox, which for some reason, feels a little heavier. Just as you go out the door, you feel some odd things on your neck and arms. "What the-" you start to say before looking at your arms. A couple of yellow bands have formed on your forearms and on the inside are tied up with black string. Also, a black band has appeared on your left wrist (your watch is on your right). It looks like a wrap around band.

As you wonder about these sudden changes, you look inside your undershirt to see what is on your chest. There, you see a small necklace around your neck with a single jewel in the middle.

"Where did these come from?" You ask, forgetting what you tried earlier.

What's next?
15511211111121.title: head to the park

155112111111211.content:
You decide to just get into the car and head out. "Maybe I can figure out what's going on." You say to yourself as you get in the car. You start it up and get moving.

However, as you drive, you start to notice more changes. You see your waist constrict and your stomach become firm. Also, unknowingly to you, you change a bit in your groin area. Your penis shrinks to about half it's normal size. However, you do notice something that surprises you. Looking at your hands, you see them shrink to a small size. 'Am I shrinking or something?' You think but can't figure it out.
155112111111211.title: in the car

1551121111112111.content:
Eventually, you arrive at the park. "I need to calm down and just relax. Maybe I'm getting paranoid." You say as you leave your car. You don't notice that your shirt and shorts seem to heave shrunk to sort of hug your body.

As you walk into the park...
1551121111112111.title: arriving at the park

15511211111121111.content:
As you walk to the park, you notice some more changes. As you walk, your hips slowly start to flare out a bit. Not only that, some pressure in your rear builds as your butt inflates in size a little bit. It isn't that noticable right now but it might soon.

Now in the park, you...
15511211111121111.title: hips and butt inflate

155112111111211111.content:
You decide that you need to use the restroom before doing. With that in mind, you heads towards the restroom and enter a stall. However, as you sit down and pull your shorts down, you witness something shocking. You see what's left of your penis. Slowly, it retracts further into your body. The balls go inside you and become a pair of ovaries. Eventually, the penis dissappears and all that's left is a slit, forming a vagina.

You are shocked at this. "So, I wasn't imagining it after all. I'm becoming a girl for some reason." You say to yourself. You still don't remember what you did earlier, thinking that this was unrelated to that. You are forced to wait until your business is done before you are able to leave. You leave the bathroom and decide whether to stay or not.
155112111111211111.title: head to the restroom first

15512.content: Will you choose a playable character, or one that isn't playable?
15512.title: Final Fantasy 7

15512122.content:
"Aww yeah..." you said to yourself.

As much as you enjoyed FF7, Yuffie was always among your favorite female video game characters growing up. She is a cute young "ninja" and was definitely an interesting choice for a character to turn into. You anxiously prepare your new technology to begin the transformation.

However, you were a little picky when it came to attire. Do you wish to turn into her original game outfit or the outfit she wears in the Advent Children CGI film?
15512122.title: Yuffie

155132.content: Maybe one in the Tactics series?
155132.title: Final Fantasy Tactics

15513221.content: Do you want to become Terra?
15513221.title: Terra?

155132211.content:
Terra in human form: http://clest.deviantart.com/art/Terra-ru...
Terra in Esper form: http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20...

You had always wanted to know what it was like to be Terra, a half-human, half-esper magical powerhouse. If the watch worked (the key word being ‘if’), then Terra was the perfect test subject.

You start up your old “Final Fantasy VI Advance” game, put Terra into your party, and scan the head shot they give of her. You then follow the instructions to make the changes you want, and press the ‘apply’ button.

Nothing seems to happen at first…
155132211.title: Terra Transformation

1551322111.content:
After roughly three seconds, you feel something happen. Your clothes are changing from a standard, modern-day guy's outfit into what Terra wears (whatever it's called, I don't know the names). It feels strange, honestly, as your clothes snake around you.

Then comes your body. You experience massive amounts of pain as your body's basic structure twists around, your flesh and muscles stretch, contract, and soften, and your sex inverts... or you figure you should, but it's really not that painful at all. It is painful, but not much worse than getting a filling on novocain.

And just like that, you're the spitting image of Terra. Hourglass figure, long green hair, and weird clothes. You know this based on a bathroom trip you take for the sole purpose of using the mirror.

So, since it evidently works, what to do now?
1551322111.title: Terra Transformation (cont'd option 1)

choices: Figure out a way to get to Emily's without drawing undue attention.
15513221112.content:
You grin as you realize who would get a kick out of this - your friend Emily. She has a crush on you (and it's completely obvious), but you remain silent because it's her business until she confesses to you. Not that you don't like her back (you do), but that's your business until you confess, and you're not confessing until or unless it's her business. In other words, you're a hopeless procrastinator.

So, anyway, you decide to go show Emily. Or you decide that, but practically, it's another matter. If you go out like you are, you'll get too much attention because of your clothes. Your mother isn't quite as built as you are now, so her clothes won't fit you. Your sister Laura presents the opposite problem.

What to do...?
15513221112.title: "Terra" goes outside

choices: End the Vanish effect and ring the doorbell
155132211122.content:
You're just about to bite the bullet and go to Emily's as you are and hang the attention, when you realize: you're Terra! You can cast Vanish and make yourself invisible! Or no, Terra has to learn Vanish from Magicite, so maybe not. But it's worth a shot.

You try to remember what a character used to do to cast a spell, but the problem is, there's nothing to remember. All they showed was the character's hands and mouth moving, and then the spell being cast. And no sooner do you realize that, than the instructions for the Vanish spell float to your mind.

You make the necessary hand motions and whisper the necessary incantation, and a slight tingle covers your body. You can't tell if it worked, so you bring your hand in front of your face. All you can see is a slight distortion of light in the shape of your hand. Final say: It works.

Traversing the town is harder than it would appear. People keep bumping into you because they can't see you, then wondering what they bumped into. You can't take a bus, because that's just asking for trouble, and Emily's house is a while away from yours on foot. Thank God Terra doesn't wear high heels.

Long story short, you finally do arrive at Emily's house, and you are just about to ring the doorbell when you wonder if you should become visible first.
155132211122.title: "Terra" at Emily's

choices: Play around with her a bit.
1551322111221.content:
You shrug invisibly. It doesn’t matter. You press the doorbell.

“Coming!” You hear Emily’s voice say from inside, and a few seconds later, punctuated by footsteps, she opens the door. Her confused face is fun to see, considering, but if you laugh now, you ruin the curveball. Anyway, she slams the door on you.

You ring the doorbell again.

Emily comes again, faster this time. She opens the door, and sees nothing. She closes it again.

Now, as much as you like this power, you’re not too thrilled about aggravating the object of your crush. So this time, you end the effect, revealing yourself, and ring the doorbell a third time.

Emily comes to the door and opens it, initially having an irritated look on her face, but turning to surprised when she finds someone actually there. Well, someone visible, anyway.

“Hello,” You say.

“Ah, can I help you?” Emily asks.

Oops. You forgot that Emily never really started Final Fantasy VI. She got bored with the long prologue, followed by the mystifying beginning to the plot, and stopped playing.

So, what to do?
1551322111221.title: Ding-dong, nobody's here

15513221112211.content:
“Hey, Emily,” You say. “Gimme a moment…” You fiddle around with the watch and turn back to normal.

Emily gasps. “Anthony!?” She says, and then she faints.

“Oops.” You mutter. Surprising her like that may not have been the best idea. You pick her up, wincing at how heavy she is (so heavy you have to carry her slung over your shoulder like a sack of potatoes), and carry her into her room.

It seems a good idea to stay with her until she wakes up.
15513221112211.title: Guess Who?

choices: She wants you to listen to her confession of love.
She wants to turn into a fictional girl.
155132211122111.content:
After roughly thirty minutes, Emily wakes up. "Uuuhhh..." she groans.

"Awake, are you?" you say, grinning.

"Anthony?" Emily asks, then she jerks bolt upright. "Anthony! I had a nightmare that some strange, green-haired woman rang my doorbell and turned into you!"

"Well, about that..." You fiddle around with the watch for a second, select Terra, and press the Execute button. Instantly, you feel the same weird sensations as when you first transformed.

Emily looks at you, blankly at first, but then her eyes widen. "That... that really happened?" she asks.

You nod. "It's this watch thing," you say. You give her the full explanation.

Emily starts nodding gravely. "Okay, so that thing on your wrist allows you to become any fictional girl?"

"Yup."

"And your current form is the main character of Final Fantasy 6?"

"Mmm-hmm."

"In that case, I'd like you to do me a favor."
155132211122111.title: Emily's Awakening

choices: "I'd like to see what Terra can do in real life."
"I'd like to become a fictional girl myself for a bit."
1551322111221111.content:
"Okay, first," Emily says, "change back. This is going to be awkward if we're both girls."

Reading between the lines, you figure she's going to confess to you. "Okay," you say, changing back. "What is it?"

"Anthony... I love you," she says.

"Me too."

"What? Wait, do you mean as a friend or...?"

"No, I love you as a woman," you say, although saying that makes you sound uncomfortably mature, at least to yourself. "I always have, and I've known that you like me, but I've waited for you to make the first move."

Emily's mouth parts slightly. "You..." she says.

"Should we go steady?" you ask her.

"Yeah, before that..." Emily says.
1551322111221111.title: Emily's Confession

15513221112211111.content:
“I think I might want to become Terra for a bit,” Emily says.

“Okay, I guess,” you say. “Promise me a date with her?”

“I thought you said you loved me?!” Emily whines, making a sad face.

This is so completely unexpected (not to mention unfair) that you find yourself speechless.

Emily laughs. “I’m kidding,” she says. “I don’t mind. Only, I’d like you to date me as me too.”

“Done,” you say. Fiddling with your watch, you change Emily into Terra. She gasps at the weird sensations you know she’s feeling. Within seconds, the change is done, and a perfect Terra replica stands before you.

You find yourself tongue-tied. You didn’t look long enough to really notice while you were looking at yourself in the mirror, but Terra is breathtakingly beautiful.

“Okay,” Emily says. She notes your hesitation, but doesn’t comment. “So, what can Terra do?”

“Ah… she has access to all three levels of Fire magic, not to mention all three levels of Cure magic, Drain magic, and Ultima magic. But it seems she also knows every other spell in the book, because I managed to cast Vanish on my way over here.”

“Vanish…?” Emily says. “Oh, so that’s why I didn’t see you when you rang the doorbell!”

“Yeah,” you say. “Sorry. That was a mean trick.”

“Relax,” Emily says. “Water under the bridge. Now where should we go? I’ll let you pick the first stop.”
15513221112211111.title: Terra-ing up Emily

155132211122111112.content:
Thankfully, Emily's older sister Jane has clothing in Terra's size, so she doesn't have to go in Terra's embarrassing garb. At your suggestion, she used the Teleport spell to get you both back to your house, where you picked up your car keys and started driving toward Emily's favorite diner.

That brings you to the present.

"So," Emily says. "Tell me a bit more about Terra."

"Well," you start. You're still a bit nervous around Emily as Terra, but no more nervous than you were with Emily when you first met her and found her attractive. "She's half-Esper."

"Meaning...?"

"Meaning she can switch between human form and a naked but still female Esper form that looks like a monster."

"Oh," she says. "Thank goodness for low-quality graphics."

"Yeah, so try not to use it. You'll get hauled in for indecent exposure." You and Emily share a hearty laugh over that line. Clearing your throat, you add, "So, anyway, you can cast Ultima - told you about that one - as well as Holy, Stop, Quick - that one freezes time and allows you an extra action for one turn - Bio, and Flare. I know how you love Flare."

Emily nods. She loves casting Flare when she plays the Final Fantasy series.

"You can also cause any number of natural disasters, including floods, earthquakes, and tornadoes, as well as cast Gravity, Graviga, and Gravija.”

“Isn’t Gravija a boss-only move?” Emily asks.

“Not in Final Fantasy 6’s book,” you say, grinning. “Oh, it’s hard to get. You have to defeat the Kaiser Dragon, well, that or take advantage of a little glitch involving the pause menu to get past the Kaiser Dragon without defeating it.”

“Huh,” Emily says. “Maybe I should give 6 another chance.”

“You should,” you say. “Definitely. And we’re here,” you add as you arrive at the diner.
155132211122111112.title: On the way there

choices: ... takes a bite of ham-, well, "steakburger".
1551322111221111121.content:
Emily orders an expensive “steakburger” (which just seems to be an ordinary hamburger with an inflated price) and a large Barq’s Root Beer, both on your wallet. You order a much cheaper cheeseburger and a Coke.

As you eat, you notice that Emily is getting a lot of stares. Some seem to be staring at her lime green hair, some seem to be admiring her beauty, and some seem to be staring at her chest, which irks you. You don’t blame them, but it does irritate you that they’re staring at your (new) girlfriend.

“Hey,” you say. “Emily.”

Emily swallows a particularly large bite of “steakburger” and says, “What is it?”

“Do you… want to become Terra?” you ask.

“I thought I already have?”

“No, I mean permanently, with everyone thinking that you’ve always looked like that.”

“You… can do that?” Emily says, dumbfounded.

“Well, I just found out now,” you admit. You had been monkeying around with the watch just prior to asking her, and found that particular function. “If I understand this correctly, I can even have the watch align Terra’s age with yours, so you’d look like Terra did when she was fifteen. Of course, if you want to look like you do now, I can disable that function. Also, you’d have all the powers Terra has. What do you say?”

Emily opens her mouth and…
1551322111221111121.title: At the Diner

15513221112211111211.content:
"Yeah, sure, why not," she says.

"Really?" you ask. "Don't you want to think it over a bit first?"

"Yeah," she says. "Anyway, you can input my data into it, right? I mean, there's no reason you can't, right?"

"I guess," you say uncertainly. "Let's go somewhere private and try it."

Emily blinks. "Somewhere private? Why?"

"Because your green hair is attracting odd looks, and so are your beauty and bust line," you say. Emily blushes a bit at your mention of her breasts, but doesn't call you out on it.

"Okay, but why is that a problem?" Emily asks.

"Because I'd have to change you back," you say.

"Oh! Oh, oh, oh," Emily says, wincing at her mental blunder. "Yeah, let's finish up, and go to the car."


You finish your respective meals, pay the tab, and leave the restaurant. Emily gets into the passenger’s side first, and you realize you left the car doors unlocked, a serious mistake on your part.

“Ready?” you ask.

“Yeah. Let’s do it.”

“Got it,” you say. You fiddle with the watch a bit, and Emily changes back to her old self. “Okay, now I think the watch has to be very close to the person or picture to scan it. Hold still.”

“Why don’t I just put my hand on the thing?” Emily asks.

“Good idea. Let’s go.”

Emily places her hand on the watch, you press the Scan button, and when you check the databanks again, Emily’s data is in the watch. “Success.”

“Okay. Now turn me into Terra.”

“Okay.” You turn Emily into Terra. “Now, do you want to synch the ages?”
15513221112211111211.title: Emily's Choice

155132211122111112111.content:
"Of course," Emily says. "I don't want to look exactly like Terra."

"Got it. Let's start." You go through the process of programming the watch to make Emily's current form hers, while adjusting it to match her age. It's more complicated than you expected, but you manage it. "Okay. Execute." You press the Apply button.

Emily's form starts shrinking slightly. She loses some of Terra's mature look, as her face ages backwards, her height decreases, her hourglass figure becomes less prominent (but doesn't go away entirely), and her hair shortens to shoulder-length and loses some of its curliness. Emily still looks just as beautiful, but she doesn't make you quite as uncomfortable as when she looked like she was in her early twenties.

Incidentally, her clothes do not shrink with her, and she ends up looking like a fifteen-year-old playing dress-up in a very juvenile manner.

You blush, and Emily blushes redder and starts casting a spell. She and her clothes disappear.

"Emily?" you ask.

Moments later, Emily reappears dressed in her own clothes. "Sorry," she said.

"Don't worry about it," you say. "I'm just impressed you managed the Teleport spell as embarrassed as you were."

"I've done it before," Emily says. "It just came naturally this time."

"I envy your memory," you say. "So, where to next?"
155132211122111112111.title: Emily's New Look

1551322111221111121112.content:
"I'd like to see whether this actually worked or not," Emily says. She digs around in her wallet, removes her high school ID, and checks it. "Yeah, it works." Her ID now bore a picture of Terra.

"Perfect," you say. "So, to repeat an earlier question, where to next?"

"How about the water park?" Emily asks. "That sounds good right now. Especially considering that the diner wasn't really air-conditioned very well."

"Okay," you say, "but what about swimsuits?"

"That one's simple," she says, grinning. "I still need some practice with spells anyway."

"If you're going to overuse spells like that," you point out, "you might as well teleport us both and the car back to my place."

"I can do both of us and two people besides," Emily says matter-of-factly, "but not the car unless I'm only teleporting myself as well."

"How do you know that?"

Emily looks confused for a moment, but then shrugs. “Maybe knowledge like this comes with the body?”

"Okay," you say. “Let’s drive back.”


This is taking a chunk out of your pocket change, what with Emily’s expensive meal and the gas mileage, but thankfully Emily agrees to handle transportation from here on out. You change into a pair of swim trunks, and Emily changes into a blue one-piece that matches her green hair. Then, Emily teleports you both to the water park.

You do not arrive at the water park’s gates, like you expect. Instead, you see the gloomy sight of the interior of what is apparently a storage shed.

“No cameras in here,” Emily says. “They won’t be able to catch us dodging the entry fee.”

You grin at her. “You are evil,” you say, making sure by your tone of voice that Emily knows that you’re joking.

“Thank you,” Emily says, grinning back.

The time that follows is a blur to you. During a short break, you remember you and Emily splashing each other with water. You also vaguely remember losing your trunks in the pool, and having to dive after them while Emily tried and failed to suppress a belly laugh.

“Hey,” someone says.
1551322111221111121112.title: The water park!

15513221112211111211121.content:
You and Emily are resting at the water's edge. You look up at the person who greeted you, and it's a brown-haired, bespectacled guy with a serious monotone. His name is Nick, and incidentally, he likes to draw and is good at everything that requires more than half a brain. He's a bit of an oddball socially, but he's also fun to be around. He's also extremely perceptive. He and Emily used to be art partners.

"Hey, Nick," you say. "What's up?"

"With me?" Nick asks. "How about what's up with you two? What's been happening?"

"Excuse me?" Emily asks. She's starting to get uncomfortable, for obvious reasons.

"I mean, are you two here together?"

"Oh! Oh, yes we are," Emily says.

"Hey," you say. "Any luck on that drawing of Emily that you were, well, drawing?" Emily had requested a realistic drawing of herself a week ago. Nick had charged her ten dollars for it, on the grounds of expenses. He had also taken a picture of Emily to use as reference.

"Yeah, I’m taking a break here,” Nick says. “Actually, I brought everything I need for it with me.”

“To a water park?” you ask.

Nick nods. “So I figure that if you two want to see what I’ve done so far, go right ahead. I’ll go get it.” He walked off.

Emily looked after him. “Has the picture changed like my ID has?” she asked worriedly.

“It should have,” you say. “At least, there’s no reason it shouldn’t have.”

“This is making me nervous,” Emily says.

“Sorry for the wait,” Nick says. “Here.” He presents a piece of canvas with a picture of Emily on it…
15513221112211111211121.title: Say Hello to Nick

155132211122111112111211.content:
... as she used to be.

Nick looks at your and Emily's stunned faces, and then takes a look at the picture himself. "How did this happen?" he asks. He brings out the picture of Emily that he used, which has changed due to you locking in Emily's form.

Trouble.

Nick sits down beside you two and looks between the two pictures, one an unfinished drawing, the other a photograph. "I know I based this drawing on this photograph," he said. "I remember studying the photograph carefully, so as not to make any mistakes. It should be accurate..." He starts whispering to himself, and then says, "Emily, what's happened since I saw you last?"

"Nothing-" Emily starts, only to be interrupted by Nick.

"Don't give me that. Something happened, and you know it. What was it?"

This puts you both in a dilemma. What to do...?
155132211122111112111211.title: Nick's Unfinished Drawing

1551322111221111121112111.content:
"I'll tell you," you say.

You tell Nick everything, from what had happened earlier that day to the present.

"So," Nick says.

"So," you say.

"Did you expect me to believe something like that?" Nick asks, deadpan.

"Well, yeah," you say. Knowing Nick, he says exactly what's on his mind. If he meant to imply that he didn't believe you, he would have said so outright.

Your analysis turns out correct. "You were right," Nick says. "The proof is right in front of my eyes, after all."

"Okay," Emily says. "But why didn't the picture change?"

"If I had to guess..." Nick stroked his chin. "I'd say this is a reinvention of the Schrodinger's Cat paradox."

"The what?" Emily asks.

"Schrodinger's Cat," Nick said. “He set up an experiment so that a cat trapped in a box would have a fifty percent chance of dying after one week. His case was that at the end of the week, until he opened the box to check on the cat, the cat was both alive and dead.

“What a weird theory,” Emily says. “And how does it relate to your picture?”

“Until the picture is finished, it’s not an accurate representation of the person it’s of. In other words, it could become a picture of anyone at all, without even a need to erase lines. For instance, if I were to finish your nose so that it looked flat, then the picture would be of someone who had a flat nose but otherwise looked exactly like you. In other words, until the picture is finished, it is both of you and not of you.” Nick looks winded after delivering that particular speech.

“Okay,” Emily says. “Incidentally, you already have all your materials, so you can redo the picture at no cost, right?”

“Yes, that’s right.” Nick brushes a sheet of sweat off of his forehead. “Well, bye Emily, bye Anthony.”

“Bye,” you say.

“Bye,” Emily says.
1551322111221111121112111.title: Schrodinger's Cat

choices: Fiddle with the watch a bit.
15513221112211111211121112.content:
It's sunset by the time you and Emily exit the water park. Emily seems to have no end of energy, for whatever reason. You, on the other hand, are pooped. Incidentally, Emily managed to find any number of ways to have fun. She used Gravity to walk normally on the bottom of the pool, she cast Haste on herself to double her swimming speed (she practically hydroplaned), she used Tornado underwater (contrary to expectation, that one didn't create a whirlpool, but instead fizzled out), and she even used Vanish and tried to sneak up on you from the front. (It didn't work because all she did was make an Emily-shaped hole in the pool.) She also did several other things. It was all you could do to keep her from using Fire, Thunder, Blizzard, or Flood.

"Man, what a day!" Emily says, stretching her arms over her head. "I really enjoyed today, Anthony."

"Yeah." You say. "Same here." It's not a lie, it's just not the whole truth. "Emily?"

"Yeah?" Emily asks.

"Practice is fine but... do you really think that using magic in public is a good thing?"

"Sorry?" Emily asks.

"I mean... what if someone finds out?" You reply

That sobers her up. She can hardly forget your encounter with Nick earlier today. "You have a point. It's just... I get a rush using magic."

"I understand, but we have to be careful." You reply. "Take us home?" You ask after you're out of view from others.

“Sure,” Emily says. She casts the Teleport spell and brings you home, and then she kisses you good-bye (on the cheek) and casts Teleport again, disappearing without a trace.

155132211122111112111211122.content:
"Anthony," you hear. "Anthony, wake up."

"Uuugn..." you find yourself groaning as you wake up due to what feels like a six-point-zero magnitude earthquake. "Five more minutes..."

"No, not five more minutes! Wake up now!"

You open your eyes to see... "Terra? Holy crap, Terra's in my room!" You bolt upright out of bed.

But it isn't Terra. It... she... looks too young.

"Wrong," she says. "I'm Emily."

"Emily?" you wonder aloud, then you remember yesterday's events. "Emily! What are you doing here?"

"Waking you up," she says. "Why do you think I was shaking you?"

"I thought that was an earthquake," you say honestly. "Really, Emily. If I didn't know better, I'd say that Espers were stronger than regular humans."

"Not just that," Emily says mischievously. "It turns out that they don't need sleep either!"

"You're kidding me?" you exclaim. "You didn't sleep at all last night?!"

“Nope,” Emily grins. “I stayed awake and flew around the city in Esper form. Don’t worry,” she added, as your brows constricted. “I had the Vanish spell on. Really, you would not believe how good it felt to fly!”

“I can imagine,” you say. “Emily?”

“Yeah?” Emily asks, still grinning from ear to ear.

“I’d like you to get out while I get dressed.”

Emily started blushing. “Oh,” she said. “Sorry.” She quickly cast the Teleport spell and left the room.

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Thankfully, your room was at the other end of the house, facing away from the street, so no chance anyone on the road or on the sidewalk would see a mermaid flopping across your hard. And behind your house? Miles of forest. An ideal place to go had you opted to turn into Merida or Aurora, but no, you had to pick the Disney Princess without legs. "Hell, maybe even Tinker Bell would've been preferable. Tiny size notwithstanding, at least I'd be able to, y'know, FLY," you grumble to yourself as you tumble out your bedroom window. After flopping awkwardly in the dirt, you can practically feel it digging in between your scales. You're more anxious than ever to get to your neighbors' pool; this new mermaid body instinctively yearned for the water.

And so, you start making your way to the metal fence that separates your yard and your neighbors' pool. Those little hops you can make as a mermaid cover a good distance, but it was still considerably slower than simply walking across the yard. Halfway there, you stop to catch your breath. Your hands press down into the ground as you hunch over, trying to steady your breathing. The feel of the grass underneath and between your now-slender fingers, flesh that is now more sensitive yet supposed to withstand incalculable water pressure. Plus, being hunched over on the ground means your breasts are now dangling. Though still contained in that tight seashell bra, they feel a little different now. And at the moment, with the way you're breathing, you're quite mindful of how they press against said bra. Lastly, you've still got that ridiculously long red hair flowing everywhere. You take one hand and run it through that entangling mass, marveling at both how soft-yet-strong that hair feels, and how that hair now feels sliding against your feminine flesh.

Shaking your head, you continue your slow trek across your yard with little hops. At last, you reach the fence, and thanks to your surprising strength as Ariel, you climb over it as easily as Ariel scaled that ship. You plop down onto hard concrete after swinging your tail over, making you wince. No matter how strong Ariel was, concrete was still concrete. Instinctively, you rub your butt, forgetting for a moment that it's now all scaly. The feel of those scales underneath your hand, so surreal. You drag your hand across the entire length of your tail, feeling its scaliness, then feel the texture of your fins between your fingers. Now to mention, you can feel a hand caressing scales...YOUR scales. "I doubt... I'll ever not get amazed by all this," you think aloud as you keep examining your new mermaid tail.

Soon enough, the ache begins to fade, so you finally make the last few hops needed to reach the pool. You still at the deep end's edge for a moment, dipping your fins tentatively into the water. "OOOOH!" The moans escape your lips unbidden. Even that brief contact with water seems to energize you. Without further ado, you shove yourself off and let yourself be immersed in water. Now this invigorating feeling... It's completely overwhelming! You had been curious about your new lady parts before; breasts were supposed to be super-sensitive and fun to mess around with, you always heard. But that couldn't possibly be compared with reuniting with the water as a mermaid! Something spoiled by only one thing...

"Ack! Chlorine!" you gasp, bubbles escaping you luscious lips along with your words. Naturally, being a mermaid, you can breath water and instinctively sucked some in. Too bad the chlorinated water stings a little...

info.brief_description: You gain a device that allows you to transform into fictional girls
info.description:
Your name is Anthony. One day, you receive a watch-like device that allows you to obtain the data about fictional girls by scanning a screen or picture, or by plugging a special device that goes in it into a controller slot on a video game console. If you connect the device to the game, then you can enter the game in the body of that character. Eventually, you will gain the abilities to scan the data of female friends and to transform other humans, animals, and dolls/puppets (you won't be able to transform at the time, but you can control them with the device).

Rules:

No gay/lesbian stuff or incest.

Keep any names of characters the same throughout the story.

No killing off Anthony or ending the story.

When a boy is in a girl's form, he must be referred to as a girl. Example: Anthony (In Lethe's body) went to get something to eat since she was hungry.

No turning Anthony evil or changing his personality.

Any character who in their series is called a god will be considered a powerful spirit instead in this story, even if the charaters from their series won't call them as such.

The watch will prevent Anthony from getting a girl pregnant before he is old enough to support a child.

If Anthony and someone else who is changed wants to stay that form, then a function will appear on the watch, which will alter reality so that everyone except the two of them believe that the person has always been that way (it can't happen for Anthony). If this is done, the original form of the person is lost forever (unless it is a girl who has been scanned by the watch, then her form will be saved in it). Anthony will still have control of them, but the watch can be used to transform others again. Nobody will find it odd that the person will be the same as the girl they became.

While the watch has Anthony (or anyone/anything else that he'd transform) take the form of a character who can transform between girl forms and boy forms will be in girl form the whole time, with no traces of the boy form. While Anthony is one of them, he can't go into the series.

If Anthony is holding onto someone who is transformed when they go into the series, then he'll go in as well, and be sucked into the body of the main character (or one of them if there are many) regardless of if they or male or female, unless the player is a character in the game, in which case, he'd become that character. If the character is female, then she will be stored on the watch, if not, Anthony can transform into that character without the watch. Note: Anthony can only become one male per continuity.

If there is ever a debate on the gender of a character, then ask me, and I'll decide. Characters that are counted as female:
Haku (There is no way that Haku is a boy in my opinion).
Vivian (In the English version of Paper Mario the Thousand Year Door it is true without a doubt, and by what I understand, the info in the journal about the characters in the Japanese version comes from Mario's point of view, and since Beldam calls Vivian a man during an insult, Mario could quite possibly only believe it to be true).

With the scanning feature, you can use edited versions of characters, including female versions of male characters. If you do this, you must give a link to a picture of that character.

The device is waterproof (along with being indestructible), and can't be taken off once put on. The device also stops him from being able to be possessed, hypnotized, or brainwashed in any way, not that he knows that. If Anthony doesn't want it to be seen, it will be invisible to others.

Use proper grammar and spelling.

If I find out that someone who adds has stolen someone else's chapter, and then posted it as their own, then I'll delete it.

Please put up links to pictures of the fictional girls during the option chapters they are mentioned in, or the chapter that Anthony turns into them (I'll do my best to edit the chapters already up to include images). Don't hesitate to use pictures of what someone as the girl is doing.

There may be other things I'm forgetting, so everything else is fair game unless I remember anything else and add it.

Anthony: 16 years old. A lone-wolf, but not a mean person and is very stubborn. Will always be there for his friends if he can; become his enemy and you will have a hard time. He is not a lone-wolf towards his friends. Tall, with dark brown hair and dark brown eyes. Wears dark blue jeans or shorts, black shoes, with the shirts he wears being either completely dark blue, completely yellow, completely red, very dark blue with the word Nintendo written on the front, or black with a picture of Sonic on the front.

Laura: Anthony's older sister by a few months. 16 years old. She wears brown boots, jeans, and a black shirt. She has blond hair. She is a very selfish person who thinks she is better than everyone else. She still cares for her siblings though

Zack: Anthony's older brother. 20 years old. Gets along with Anthony and and the rest of their siblings, except Laura, although both care for each other.

Kimberly: Anthony's 42 year old mother. She wears black high heels, a grey skirt, and a grey shirt. She has long brown hair. A very kind person, she cares about other people and tries to help them if they need it.

Andy: Anthony's younger brother. 13 years old. Loves video games. (more info will be added when someone expands upon it)

Mia: Anthony's twin sister who gets along with him very well. Her favorite fictional character is Mia from the Fire Emblem series, because they share the same name, and similar personalities. She naturally has black hair, but always dyes it purple in order to be like her favorite character. She is almost always wearing a skirt or dress. She likes sports (one of the few kinds of things that she doesn't wear a skirt for), but can't stand cheerleaders. She is easily excitable, more so when she has some kind of sugar (which is why she usually isn't allowed by her family to have any when at home or out at a family event).

When she has some kind of sugar, then she gets so hyper that she sometimes starts pulling pranks, although they're never harmful. She is an odd mix of being a tomboy and girly-girl, but gets annoyed with girls who are complete girly-girls. Shares Anthony's love of the sword, anime, and video games, but because of how hyper she is, she hardly ever reads books, because she think they're too boring for the most part.. She's a little faster than Anthony, but a little weaker. She is also a couple minutes younger than him.

Henry: Anthony's father. 42 years old. Is in the military, but his section hasn't been called in to outside conflict at the time. He is about to begin some military training required, and won't be back for two weeks. He'll either leave while Anthony is at school, or the next day, depending on who is writing. (more info will be added when someone expands upon it).

Emily: A close friend of Anthony's, who he has a crush on, and who also has a crush on him, although she's too shy to admit it. She has long, flowing, natural brown hair, and green eyes. Note: In one storyline she hasn't realized her feelings for Anthony, and she'd never really tried to look for a boyfriend, but always ended up finding people she thought she liked, and went out with them, but always found out they wanted nothing but blowjobs, and she realized her feelings for Anthony after he comforted her. In all storylines other than the one mentioned above, she has always known her feelings, and has never tried to find anyone else.

She often brings Anthony her problems of any kind when she needs help, and he helps her sort them out. She wears a short sleeved white shirt, a red skirt, and sandals. She likes to read and to go to movies with her friends. She is a B+ student and she has awesome skills with her hands and mouth once she realizes it. She has a thin waist, large breasts, slender legs, tanned skin. Her favorite food is pizza, and her favorite color is green.

Billy: A friend of Anthony's. Built strong with a six pack, wear muscle shirts and shorts, and has a mullet. Easy to get along with, everyone seems to like him. He's good at some sports, he's very fast, and he likes to work out. His weakness is really big breasts.

Sarah: A girl who lives nearby Anthony. 17 years old. She's shallow, liking only what's popular, and is a real witch (Not literally, just personality wise, and I won't write the word originally used to describe her that was used by the person who created her) towards Anthony and friends. Always dyes her hair to whatever hair color is popular. Fears Laura.

Anna: A girl who has a major crush on Anthony. 15 years old. Just started the swim team 3 months ago. She has a long, straight, golden hair, average eyes, pointy nose, and her mouth is not big, but not small, and she always smiles in front of people, and giggles as she talks, which makes her look cute in the face. She is thin, and moderately short, around 160+cm in height, she has the breast of C-cup sized, it's not that big. She is also good in sports, and intelligent in her work, and she is popular among her age group, but not exactly as popular as school models. She looks up to and respects Anthony. She loves anime and video games. She wears a wide variety of clothes, but wears a green one-piece bathing suit while swimming. Anthony does not know about her feelings for him.

Zoey: 10 years old. She is majorly in love with Anthony, but has not acted on it due to age difference. She likes her friends, and unlike Sarah, she doesn't like populars or following them. She has a shortish, light brown hair in pigtails, amber-colored eyes and a smile that fits greatly on her face. She has normal breasts, not too big because she's so young. She wears mostly skirts and shirts, but she has some jeans, and sometimes she wears dresses, she loves all colors equally, and thus, she has many different colors of clothing. She likes candy (mainly chocolate), playing videogame, and she loves love stories. Anthony is friends with her, not knowing of her feelings, and often watches over her. She has the personality of an innocent girl, she wouldn't do anything bad even if forced to. She knows Anthony is a nice person, and inspires to be like him him. She loves being praised and is a hard worker.

Mary: The oldest child of Zoey, Anna, and Sarah's family, who is in college. 21 years old. Waist length, dark brown hair kept in a ponytail, shorter than Anthony, but athletic. Humble and willing to help out. She enjoys playing video games with Anthony a bit since he likes them too. Likes spending time with friends when possible. Adapt at video games somewhat (not as much as Anthony or the others), pretty fast, as she almost beat a track record. Nimble as well (as in she could be an excellent thief if she desired) She likes sticking up for people when they feel oppressed, she has a strong sense of justice, and she is a tomboy. Prefers to wear a lavender sweater over a white tank top, along regular jeans and white shoes. She has a crush on Zack, but hasn't told him yet. She doesn't know that he feels the same way.

Diana: The mother of Anna, Mary, Zoey, and Sarah. She is a widow, with her late husband being Henry's cousin.

If you create a character, then you must give the details about them, such as their appearance and personality.

Rolf Halfhearted's interactive can have a cross-over with this one. Neither Nick nor Anthony can transform each other, or anyone that the other already has transformed

I'm going to give 300 to anyone who makes an actual chapter without breaking one of my rules.
